data.title: 'Ar'ara, Israel to Salamanca, Spain
data.meta_description: Time conversion from IDT (Israel Daylight Time) (+3) to CEST (Central European Summer Time)(+2). 'Ar'ara, Israel to Salamanca, Spain time zones converter, calculator, table and map.
data.text:
Time Difference

IDT (Israel Daylight Time) is 1 hour ahead of CEST (Central European Summer Time)

10:30 pm22:30 in 'Ar'ara, Israel is 9:30 pm21:30 in Salamanca, Spain

'Ar'ara to Salamanca call time

Best time for a conference call or a meeting is between 9am-6pm in 'Ar'ara which corresponds to 8am-5pm in Salamanca

10:30 pm22:30 IDT (Israel Daylight Time) ('Ar'ara, Israel). Offset UTC +3:00 hours

9:30 pm21:30 CEST (Central European Summer Time) (Salamanca, Spain). Offset UTC +2:00 hours

10:30 pm22:30 'Ar'ara, Israel / 9:30 pm21:30 Salamanca, Spain
